content.rendered:
Rameses has over 10 years of combined lecturing and tutoring experiences in the UK and overseas. As a personal tutor with the defunct UFA (Top Tutors), an educational charity, he has taught and helped Home, EU and international students overcome their academic difficulties in various modules in Business Management and Research Methods, including SPSS. In 2019, he was awarded his PhD in Management from Cardiff Metropolitan University, specialising in Human Resource Management and Organisational Behaviour (HRM & OB).

Prior to completing his doctoral studies and re-joining academia, he worked as a researcher for London-based international firm Finaccord (now part of the Aon Group) for over 6 years. Working with a multilingual team of researchers, he was involved in B2B research projects about markets in Western Europe (UK and Ireland), North America (US and Canada), Australia, South Africa, Asia (India, Malaysia, Singapore and Philippines) and GCC countries. Rameses has an MSc in International Human Resource Management (awarded with merit) from Royal Holloway, University of London in 2010. He also worked in HR for several years in the retail sector and manufacturing industry. He has held an active membership with the CIPD since 2011.

At Regent College London he conducts lectures and seminars for the University of Bolton programmes. Modules taught include, but not limited to: Level 6 (Top Up) – International Human Resource Management; Level 3 (Foundation Year) – Business in Practice and World of Work.

He also taught modules with another learning partner, Bucks New University on the following: Level 4 – Introduction to People Management, Organisational Behaviour and Career Viewpoint; Level 3 (Foundation Year) – Introduction to Business Studies.

He supervises the final year (Top Up) students with their dissertation under the University of Bolton programme. He also provides support and services to student campaigns and recruitment through the conduct of academic interviews.

He is currently Programme Leader for Level 6 (final year and Top Up students) for University of Northampton and Bucks New University programmes.

Courses taught

  • BSc (Hons) Business Management with Foundation Year
  • BSc (Hons) Business Management (Top Up)
  • BA (Hons) Business Management with Foundation Year
  • BA (Hons) Marketing with Foundation Year

Research Interests and Publications

Manalang, R.T. (2019) ‘Learning wellness: a case study of a wellbeing initiative through the lens of organisational learning’ (monograph, PhD thesis). Cardiff Metropolitan University, School of Management, United Kingdom. Available at https://repository.cardiffmet.ac.uk/handle/10369/73

Manalang, R.T. (2015) ‘Learning Wellness’ (developmental paper). British Academy of Management (BAM) Annual Conference, 8-10 September 2015, University of Portsmouth, United Kingdom. Available at BAM 2015 conference proceedings (ISBN: 978-0-9549608-8-9).
